price: ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ߸ ߡߐ߱ ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߠߊ ߦߴߊ߬ ߝߍ߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߟߍߙߊ߫ ߟߊߞߊ߬ߣߍ߲ ߘߏ߫ ߟߎ߫ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: bal yurīdu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yu'tā ṣuḥufan munasharatan
